name: Prism Ship
description:
Simple color based survival shooter made for MiniLD #56

-- Basic Rules --

You change color

You can fire bullets of your color

Bullets destroy blocks that match their color

You get 10 points per block destroyed

Things get harder the more you score

-- Controls --

- Keyboard

- Arrow keys or WASD to move

- Space to fire

- Touch

- Touching to left or right of ship makes it move left and right

- Easiest to control ship by dragging your finger along underneath it

- Touch with 2 fingers to fire
